Resources.Source: or
Resources.Translation: ili

Resources.Source: Not selected
Resources.Translation: Nije izabrano

Resources.Source: Choose a file to attach:
Resources.Translation: Izaberi datoteku za dodavanje:

Resources.Source: The form field, {0}, is missing.
Resources.Translation: Polje oblika, {0}, nedostaje.

Resources.Source: Correct answer
Resources.Translation: Ispravan odogovor

Resources.Source: A requested file could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Zatražena datoteka se ne može pronaći.

Resources.Source: No file attached.
Resources.Translation: Nije nadodana datoteka.

Resources.Source: Incorrect answer
Resources.Translation: Netočan odogovor

Resources.Source: Incorrect answer
Resources.Translation: Netočan odogovor

Resources.Source: Detach File
Resources.Translation: Odvoji datoteku

Resources.Source: A requested file attachment could not be found.
Resources.Translation: Tražena datoteka privitka ne može se pronaći.

Resources.Source: View File
Resources.Translation: Pogledaj datoteku

Resources.Source: Browse...
Resources.Translation: Pregledaj...

Resources.Source: The type attribute has an invalid value in the assessment markup: {0}
Resources.Translation: Atribut tipa ima pogrešnu vrijednost u oznaci procjene: {0}

Resources.Source: Instructor comments:
Resources.Translation: Zabilješke instruktora:

Resources.Source: <Unanswered>
Resources.Translation: <Neodgovoreno>

Resources.Source: "The text entered is formatted incorrectly or greater than the maximum {0} characters."
Resources.Translation: "Unešeni tekst je neispravno formatiran ili je veći od maksimuma {0} znakova."

Resources.Source: The posted <option> value, {0}, is out of range for the <select> tag with name="{1}".
Resources.Translation: Poslana <option> vrijednost, {0}, je van opsega za <select> tag sa imenom="{1}".

Resources.Source: Correct answer
Resources.Translation: Točan odgovor

Resources.Source: View the attached file.
Resources.Translation: Pogledaj datoteku u privitku.

Resources.Source: The value, {0}, of the form field, {1}, is invalid.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost, {0}, polja forme, {1}, je pogrešno.

Resources.Source: "The score entered is formatted incorrectly or outside the allowable range of -1000 to 1000."
Resources.Translation: "Unešeni rezultat je formatiran neispravno ili je van dozvoljenog niza od -1000 do 1000."

Resources.Source: Correct answer:
Resources.Translation: Točan odgovor:

Resources.Source: Selected
Resources.Translation: Izabrano

Resources.Source: This is the correct answer but it was not selected
Resources.Translation: Ovo je točan odgovor ali nije izabran

Resources.Source: There is an attached {0} file.
Resources.Translation: U privitku je {0} datoteka.

Resources.Source: Replace the attached file with another file:
Resources.Translation: Zamjeni datoteku u privitku s drugom datotekom:

Resources.Source: The value of the id is invalid in the assessment markup: {0}
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost id je pogršna u oznaci procjene: {0}

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that exceeded the supported length.
Resources.Translation: Element modela podatka '{0}' je prekoračio dozvoljenu dužinu.

Resources.Source: The package compression format is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Format sažetog pakiranja nije podržan.

Resources.Source: Sequencing is flowing to activity '{0}'.
Resources.Translation: Sekvenca vodi do aktivnosti'{0}'.

Resources.Source: The .zip file cannot be found.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka .zip se ne može naći.

Resources.Source: The value cannot be set to null.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost ne može biti nula.

Resources.Source: A parameter contains an empty string, which is not allowed.
Resources.Translation: Parametar sadrži prazni string, što nije dozvoljeno.

Resources.Source: The requested item, {0}, can not be accessed.
Resources.Translation: Zatraženoj stavci, {0}, ne može se pristupiti.

Resources.Source: No unique identifiers are defined for items in this list.
Resources.Translation: Nema jedinstvenog identifikatora definiranog za stavku u listi.

Resources.Source: Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Izaberi Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: No activities to consider.
Resources.Translation: Nema aktivnosti za razmatranje.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna aktivnost nije definirana. Sljedeća sjednica nije započela.

Resources.Source: A suspended activity is not defined.
Resources.Translation: Obustavljena aktivnost nije definirana.

Resources.Source: A current activity is already defined. The sequencing session has already begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutna aktivnost je već definirana. sljedećaa sjednica je već započela.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nijedna aktivnost ne "prethodi" rootu.

Resources.Source: Unsupported navigation request.
Resources.Translation: Navigacija nije podržana.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Povreda Flow Sequencing Control Mode.

Resources.Source: Flow or Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Flow or Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: Rollup aborted because child activity '{0}' does not have a primary objective.
Resources.Translation: Pojavljivanje prekinuto jer aktivnost djeteta '{0}' nema primarni cilj.

Resources.Source: RetryAll
Resources.Translation: Pokušaj sve

Resources.Source: Identified activity is already active.
Resources.Translation: Identificirana aktivnost je također aktivna.

Resources.Source: Read error.
Resources.Translation: Pogreška čitanja.

Resources.Source: Activity '{0}' skipped because its pre-condition Skip rules evaluated as true.
Resources.Translation: Aktivnost '{0}' preskočena jer se njezino pred uvjetno pravilo Skoka vrednuje kao istinito.

Resources.Source: The ZipPackageReader has encountered an error and cannot continue.
Resources.Translation: ZipPackageReader je pronašao pogrešku i ne može nastaviti.

Resources.Source: The item specified is already added to this or another list belonging to this data model.
Resources.Translation: Specificirana stavka je nadodana na ovu ili druge liste koje pripadajuć ovom modelu podataka.

Resources.Source: Rollup initiated for activity '{0}'.
Resources.Translation: Pojavljivanje inicirano za aktivnost '{0}'.

Resources.Source: The entry point of the current activity is not contained within this package.
Resources.Translation: Ulazna točka za trenutačnu aktivnost ne nalazi se u ovom pakiranju.

Resources.Source: Retry
Resources.Translation: Pokušaj ponovno

Resources.Source: End of stream reached.
Resources.Translation: Dostignut kraj tijeka.

Resources.Source: A required identifier was not provided for this element.
Resources.Translation: Traženi identifikator nije omogućen za ovaj element.

Resources.Source: ExitAll
Resources.Translation: Izlaz iz svega

Resources.Source: Stream must have read and seek capability.
Resources.Translation: Tijek mora imati sposobnost čitanja i traženja.

Resources.Source: The key specified '{0}' does not match the identifier within the item to be added to the dictionary '{1}'.
Resources.Translation: Specificirani ključ '{0}' ne odgovara identifikatoru unutar stavke za nadodavanje u rječnik '{1}'.

Resources.Source: Sequencing Post Condition rule on activity '{0}' resulted in a {1} request.
Resources.Translation: Sequencing Post Condition pravilo na aktivnosti '{0}' rezultiralo je {1} zahtjevom.

Resources.Source: The value cannot be set to an empty or null string.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost ne može biti postavljena na nulu ili prazni niz znakova.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to reactivate the current session. Only a completed or abandoned session may be reactivated, and only in RandomAccess view.
Resources.Translation: Nije ispravno reaktiviranje trenutačne sjednice. Samo završena ili napuštena sjednica može biti reaktivirana, i samo u RandomAccess pogledu.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to exit the current session. Only a session that has started may be exited, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Nije ispravno izaći iz trenutalne sjednice. Samo iz sjednice koja je započela može se izaći, i samo u Izvršnom pogledu.

Resources.Source: Cannot remove or replace the primary objective.
Resources.Translation: Ne može se ukloniti ili zamijeniti primarni objekt.

Resources.Source: A CurrentActivity that is active is required to exist before requesting this operation.
Resources.Translation: CurrentActivity koja je aktivna, treba postojati prije zahtjeva za ovom operacijom.

Resources.Source: Cannot change the identifier if an item in a dictionary. Try removing the item, changing the identifier, then re-adding it.
Resources.Translation: Ne može se promjeniti identifikator ako je jedna stavka u rječniku. Pokušaj ukloniti stavku, mijanjajući identifikator, onda ga ponovno nadodaj.

Resources.Source: The '{0}' data model element is only valid in SCORM 2004 packages.
Resources.Translation: '{0}' element model podatka je ispravan samo u SCORM 2004 pakiranju.

Resources.Source: The '{0}' data model element is only valid in SCORM 1.2 packages.
Resources.Translation: '{0}' element model podatka je ispravan samo u SCORM 1.2 pakiranju.

Resources.Source: The index is out of range.
Resources.Translation: Index je van opsega.

Resources.Source: ExitParent
Resources.Translation: Napusti roditelja

Resources.Source: The current activity in the session defines an entry point that does not exist in the package. The content cannot be read.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost u sjednici definira ulaznu točku koja ne postoji u pakiranju. Sadržaj se ne može pročitati.

Resources.Source: An object created for use by a different data model cannot be added to this data model.
Resources.Translation: Objekt kreiran za upotrebu od strane rezličitog modela podataka ne može biti nadodan ovom modelu podataka.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to resume the current session. Only a suspended session may be resumed, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Nije ispravno nastaviti trenutačnu sjednicu. Samo obustavljena sjednica može biti nastavljena, i to u Izvršnom pogledu.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to suspend the current session. Only an active session may be suspended, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Nije ispravno obustaviti trenutačnu sjednicu. Samo aktivna sjednica može biti obustavljena, i to u Izvršnom pogledu.

Resources.Source: The package is missing the required file, imsmanifest.xml.
Resources.Translation: Pakiranju nedostaje tražena datoteka, imsmanifest.xml.

Resources.Source: The requested directory, {0}, can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Zatražena mapa, {0}, se ne može pronaći.

Resources.Source: The list cannot be modified.
Resources.Translation: Lista ne može biti modificirana.

Resources.Source: Undefined navigation request.
Resources.Translation: Nedefiniran zahtjev za navigaciju.

Resources.Source: The current activty is already terminated.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost je također završena.

Resources.Source: Target activity does not exist.
Resources.Translation: Ciljna aktivnost ne postoji.

Resources.Source: Choice Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Izaberi Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: The RenderContext.RelativePath must have a value.
Resources.Translation: RenderContext.RelativePath mora imati vrijednost.

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. The Index.xml or imsmanifest.xml file cannot be found.
Resources.Translation: Dogodila se pogreška kod raspakiravanja datoteka. Ne mogu se pronaći datoteke Index.xml ili imsmanifest.xml.

Resources.Source: An item with the identifier '{0}' already exists in this list.
Resources.Translation: Stavka sa identifikatorom '{0}' već postoji na ovoj listi.

Resources.Source: The requested file was not found in the package.
Resources.Translation: Tražena datoteka nije pronađena u pakiranju.

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that was out of range according to the SCORM 2004 specifications.
Resources.Translation: Element model podataka '{0}' prelazi vrijednost koja je van opsega prema SCORM 2004 specifikaciji.

Resources.Source: Continue
Resources.Translation: Nastavi

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. Unable to determine the file format.
Resources.Translation: Dogodila se pogreška kod raspakiravanja datoteka. Ne može se odrediti format datoteka.

Resources.Source: Navigation resulted in making '{0}' the current active activity.
Resources.Translation: Navigacija je rezultirala u stvaranju '{0}' trenutačne aktivne aktivnosti.

Resources.Source: An error occurred while unbundling the file. A file with multiple Learning Resources is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Dogodila se pogreška kod raspakiravanja datoteka. Datoteka sa višestrukim Learning resursima nije podržana.

Resources.Source: Sequencing cannot proceed because the required objective '{0}' was not found.
Resources.Translation: Sekvenciranje se ne može nastaviti jer zahtjevani cilj '{0}' nije pronađen.

Resources.Source: Data model element '{0}' was passed a value that was out of range according to the SCORM 1.2 specifications.
Resources.Translation: Element model podataka '{0}' odgovara s vrijednošću koja je van opsega prema SCORM 1.2 specifikaciji.

Resources.Source: This LearningDataModel object may not be written to.
Resources.Translation: Ne može se pisati na objekt LearningDataModel.

Resources.Source: Unsupported type '{0}' added to extension data.
Resources.Translation: Nepodržani tip '{0}' pridodan podatkovnoj ekstenziji.

Resources.Source: Rollup setting normalized measure to {0} for activity '{1}'.
Resources.Translation: Pojavljivanje podešavanja normaliziranih mjera {0} za aktivnost '{1}'.

Resources.Source: The relativePath value '{0}' does not represent a valid, package-relative path.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost relativePath '{0}' ne reprezentira ispravan put koji se odnosi na pakiranje.

Resources.Source: Cannot copy to '{0}' because a file or directory with the same name already exists. This operation can only copy to a destination that does not yet exist. It will create the destination directory.
Resources.Translation: Ne može se kopirati u '{0}' jer datoteka ili mapa sa istim nazivom već postoji. Ova operacija može samo kopirati na odredište koje još ne postoji. Ono će kreirati odredišnu mapu.

Resources.Source: Navigation complete. No current activity.
Resources.Translation: Navigacija završena. Nema trenutačne aktivnosti.

Resources.Source: Sequencing Exit rule requires that activity '{0}' terminate.
Resources.Translation: Pravilo Izlaza sekvenciranja zahtjeva prekid aktivnosti '{0}'.

Resources.Source: No item with the identifier '{0}' was found in this list.
Resources.Translation: Stavka sa identifikatorom '{0}' nije pronađena na ovoj listi.

Resources.Source: Error code: {0}
Resources.Translation: Pogreška koda: {0}

Resources.Source: A CurrentActivity is required to exist before requesting this operation.
Resources.Translation: zahtjeva se postojanje CurrentActivity prije zahtjeva za ovom operacijom.

Resources.Source: The object is not in the correct NameTable.
Resources.Translation: Objekt nije u ispravnoj NameTable.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: The current activity is active or suspended.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost je aktivna ili obustavljena.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost nije još definirana. Sjednica sekvenciranja nije započela.

Resources.Source: Undefined sequencing request.
Resources.Translation: Nedefiniran zahtjev za sekvenciranjem.

Resources.Source: The current activity has not been terminated.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost nije još završena.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost nije definirana. Sjednica sekvenciranja nije započela.

Resources.Source: Previous
Resources.Translation: Prethodno

Resources.Source: The Current activity already terminated.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost je već završena.

Resources.Source: Cannot suspend an inactive root.
Resources.Translation: Ne može se obustaviti neaktivni root.

Resources.Source: A Current Activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost nije još definirana. Sljedeća sjednica nije još započela.

Resources.Source: Nothing to abandon; no active activities.
Resources.Translation: Ništa za napustiti; nema aktivne aktivnosti.

Resources.Source: Undefined termination request.
Resources.Translation: Nedefinirani zahtjev prekida.

Resources.Source: Activity tree root has no parent.
Resources.Translation: Root stabla aktivnosti nema roditelja.

Resources.Source: Nothing to suspend; no active activities.
Resources.Translation: Ništa za obustaviti; nema aktivne aktivnosti.

Resources.Source: A current activity is defined. The sequencing session already begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost je definirana. Sljedeća sjednica je već započela.

Resources.Source: No Suspended Activity defined.
Resources.Translation: Nije definirana aktivnost obustave.

Resources.Source: A current activity is defined. The sequencing session already begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost je definirana. Sjednica sekvenciranja je započela.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: Activity unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Aktivnost nedostupna.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost nije definirana. Sljedeća sjednica nije još započela.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nijedna aktivnost ne "prethodi" rootu.

Resources.Source: Forward Traversal Blocked.
Resources.Translation: Forward Traversal Blocked.

Resources.Source: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Forward Only Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: No activity is "previous" to the root.
Resources.Translation: Nijedna aktivnost ne "prethodi" rootu.

Resources.Source: Cluster has no available children.
Resources.Translation: Klaster nema raspoložive djece.

Resources.Source: Last activity in the tree.
Resources.Translation: Posljednja aktivnost u stablu.

Resources.Source: Choice request prevented by Flow-only activity.
Resources.Translation: Zahtjev za izbor spriječen aktivnošću tijeka.

Resources.Source: Unable to choose target activity - constrained choice.
Resources.Translation: Nemoguće izabrati ciljnu aktivnost - ograničen izbor.

Resources.Source: Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Choice Exit Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: Unable to activate target; target is not a child of the Current Activity.
Resources.Translation: Nemoguće aktivirati cilj; cilj nije dijete trenutne aktivnosti.

Resources.Source: No activities to consider.
Resources.Translation: Aktivnosti za razmatranje.

Resources.Source: Choice Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Choice Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: Target activity hidden from choice.
Resources.Translation: Ciljna aktivnost sakrivena od izbora.

Resources.Source: Target activity does not exist or is unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Ciljna aktivnost ne postoji ili je nedostupna.

Resources.Source: No target for Choice.
Resources.Translation: Nema cilja za izbor.

Resources.Source: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.
Resources.Translation: Flow Sequencing Control Mode violation.

Resources.Source: A current activity is not defined. The sequencing session has not begun.
Resources.Translation: Trenutačna aktivnost nije definirana. Sljedeća sjednica nije započela.

Resources.Source: Activity unavailable.
Resources.Translation: Aktivnost nedostupna.

Resources.Source: Nothing to deliver.
Resources.Translation: Ništa za isporučiti.

Resources.Source: Cannot deliver a non-leaf activity.
Resources.Translation: Ne može se provesti aktivnost u dnu stabla.

Resources.Source: It is not valid to abandon the current session. Only an active or suspended session may be abandoned, and only in Execute view.
Resources.Translation: Nije ispravno napustiti trenutačnu sjednicu. Samo aktivna ili obustavljena sjednica može biti napuštena, i samo u Izvršnom pogledu.

Resources.Source: The requested manifest file cannot be rendered.
Resources.Translation: Tražena datoteka manifesta ne može biti predana.

Resources.Source: The log parameter can not be null when the ValidationBehavior requires a log.
Resources.Translation: Parametri logiranja ne mogu biti prazni kada ValidationBehavior zahtjeva log.

Resources.Source: (element has been removed)
Resources.Translation: (element je uklonjen)

Resources.Source: The referenced resource or organization can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Ne mogu se pronaći navedeni resurs ni organizacija.

Resources.Source: The <ruleCondition> node must have a condition attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.
Resources.Translation: <ruleCondition> čvor mora imati atribut uvjetovanja. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, {1}, is longer than that supported by MLC. It has been truncated to {2} characters.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost koja započinje sa "{0}" čvora, {1}, je duže nego li MLC podržava. Skraćen je za {2} znaka.

Resources.Source: The value is out of range.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost je van opsega.

Resources.Source: A <presentation> node may only appear, if needed, as a child of a leaf <item>element that references a resource.
Resources.Translation: A <presentation> čvor se može pojaviti, ukoliko je potrebno, samo kao ogranak <item>element koji upućuje na resurs.

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of element <{1}> is an invalid value. Extra information: {2}
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost "{0}" elementa <{1}> je pogrešna. Dodatne informacije: {2}

Resources.Source: A valid index.xml begins with a <LearningResource> node in the "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:learning-resource" namespace.
Resources.Translation: Ispravan index.xml započinje sa <LearningResource> čvorom u "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:learning-resource" u prostoru imena.

Resources.Source: The resource node is missing the required attribute, 'href'
Resources.Translation: Resursnom čvoru nedostaje traženi atribut, 'href'

Resources.Source: The <metadata> node is missing or in the wrong namespace on the <manifest>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.2.
Resources.Translation: <metadata> čvor nedostaje ili je u pogrešnom prostoru imena <manifest>. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.2.

Resources.Source: The required attribute, {0}, is missing on element <{1}>. Extra information:{2}
Resources.Translation: Potrebnom atributu, {0}, nedostaje element <{1}>. Dodatne informacije:{2}

Resources.Source: The value is outside the valid range [-1 to 1].
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost je izvan ispravnog niza [-1 do 1].

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, {1}, is longer than that supported by Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: čvor čija vrijednost započinje sa "{0}", {1}, je duža nego li Microsoft Learning Components podržava.

Resources.Source: The name of the erroneous node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Naziv pogrešnog čvora je: {0}

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of element <{1}> is an invalid value. It has been replaced by the default value "{2}". Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost "{0}" elementa <{1}> je pogrešna. Ona je zamijenjena sa osnovnom vrijednošću "{2}". Dodatne informacije: {3}

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> can not be found in the correct namespace. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: čvor <{0}> ne može biti pronađen u ispravnom prostoru imena. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The value is an invalid URI.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost je pogrešni URI.

Resources.Source: A default value of "{0}" has been used in place of the missing or erroneous value for the <{1}> element's "{2}" attribute.
Resources.Translation: Osnovna vrijednost "{0}" je korištena umjesto vrijednosti koja nedostaje ili je pogrešna za atribut <{1}> elementa "{2}" elementa.

Resources.Source: The value is an invalid xml:base. xml:base must be a valid URI that does not begin with a "/" but does end with a "/".
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost je pogrešna xml:baza. xml:baza mora biti ispravan URI koji ne počinje sa a "/" ali završava sa "/".

Resources.Source: The referencedObjective attribute on the {0} node is whitespace only, which is invalid. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Atribut referencedObjective na {0} čvoru je prazan, što je pogrešno. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that starts with "{1}" that is too long.
Resources.Translation: čvor <{0}> ima vrijednost koja započinje sa "{1}" koja je preduga.

Resources.Source: The full XML of the parent node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Puni XML roditeljskog čvora je: {0}

Resources.Source: The value of the <{0}> element's "{1}" attribute is missing or erroneous.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost <{0}> atributa elementa "{1}" nedostaje ili je pogrešna.

Resources.Source: The <ruleAction> node may occur 1 and only 1 time within a <preConditionRule>, <postConditionRule>, or <exitConditionRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.2.
Resources.Translation: <ruleAction> čvor može očekivati 1 i samo jednom sa <preConditionRule>, <postConditionRule>, ili <exitConditionRule>. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.2.

Resources.Source: The parent node is {0}.
Resources.Translation: Roditeljski čvor je {0}.

Resources.Source: The <rollupCondition> node can only appear once in the <rollupRule> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.
Resources.Translation: <rollupCondition> čvor može se pojaviti samo jednom u <rollupRule> čvoru. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that is too long. It has been truncated to "{1}".
Resources.Translation: čvor <{0}> ima vrijednost koja je preduga. Ona je skraćena na "{1}".

Resources.Source: The parent node, {0}, must represent a SCO.
Resources.Translation: Roditeljski čvor, {0}, mora biti SCO.

Resources.Source: The value is not one of the permitted token values.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost nije jedna od dozvoljenih vrijednosti tokena.

Resources.Source: The full XML of the erroneous node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Puni XML pogrešnog čvora je: {0}

Resources.Source: The file, {0}, referenced by the location element inside of metadata in the manifest can not be found in the package.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka, {0}, na koju upućuje element lokacije unutar meta podataka u manifestu se ne može pronaći u pakiranju.

Resources.Source: The package is a multiple learning resource package, which is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Pakiranje je višestruko pakiranje resursa za učenje, koje nije podržano.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> can not be found in the correct namespace An attempt will be made to find a child node with that name in other namespaces. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Čvor <{0}> ne može biti pronađen u ispravnom prostor imena. Pokušati će se pronaći dijete čvor s tim imenom u ostalom prostoru imena. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The <rollupAction> node can only appear once in the <rollupRule>node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.
Resources.Translation: <rollupAction> čvor može se pojaviti samo jednom u <rollupRule>čvoru. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.

Resources.Source: The value is not the expected type.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost nije očekivanog tipa.

Resources.Source: The value of the <{0}> element is missing or erroneous.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost <{0}> elementa nedostaje ili je pogrešna.

Resources.Source: The value of the PageID attribute of the {0} element is invalid. The element has been omitted from the conversion.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost atributa PageID od {0} elementa je pogrešna. Element je ispušten iz konverzacije.

Resources.Source: The file {0} is not a valid file type.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka {0} nije ispravnog tipa.

Resources.Source: An element, <{0}>, is invalid because it is illegal or has illegal attribute values. Extra information: {1}
Resources.Translation: Element, <{0}>, ne vrijedi jer je ilegalan ili ima ilegalnu vrijednost atributa. Dodatne informacije: {1}

Resources.Source: The "{0}" portion of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}> contains invalid URI characters. These have been converted into valid characters automatically. The new value is "{3}". Extra information: {4}.
Resources.Translation: "{0}" dio atributa, {1}, na elementu <{2}> sadrži pogrešne URI znakove. Oni su konvertirani u ispravne znakovne vrijednosti automatski. Nova vrijednost je "{3}". Dodatne informacije: {4}.

Resources.Source: The <title> node is required on the {0} node in Content Aggregation manifests. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.10, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.1.
Resources.Translation: <title> čvor se traži na {0} čvoru u Content Aggregation manifestu. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.10, ili SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.1.

Resources.Source: Remote content is not supported.
Resources.Translation: Udaljen sadržaj nije podržan.

Resources.Source: This learning resource requires a license and licensed Learning Resources are not supported.
Resources.Translation: Resurs za učenje zahtjeva licencu, licencirani resursi za učenje nisu podržani.

Resources.Source: The value of the <prerequisites> type attribute must be "aicc_script".
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost <prerequisites> vrste atributa mora biti "aicc_script".

Resources.Source: A default value of "{0}" has been used in place of the missing or erroneous value for the <{1}> element.
Resources.Translation: Osnovna vrijednost "{0}" je korištena umjesto nepostojeće ili pogrešne vrijednosti <{1}> elementa.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that starts with "{1}" that is too long for the "{2}" attribute.
Resources.Translation: Čvor <{0}> ima vrijednost koja započinje sa "{1}" koja je preduga za "{2}" atribut.

Resources.Source: The <item> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.
Resources.Translation: <item> čvor mora imati atribut indentifikatora. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9, ili SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.2.

Resources.Source: An Activity node is required for content used in Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Aktivni čvor se traži za sadržaj korišten u Microsoft Learning Components.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the node, <{1}>, is longer than the smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost čvora koja započinje sa "{0}", <{1}>, je duža nego smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}.

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}>, is an invalid value. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost "{0}" atributa, {1}, na elementu <{2}>, je pogrešna. Dodatne informacije: {3}

Resources.Source: The value "{0}" of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}>, is an invalid value. It has been replaced by the default value "{3}". Extra information: {4}
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost "{0}" atributa, {1}, na elementu <{2}>, je pogrešna. Zamijenjena je sa osnovnom vrijednošću "{3}". Dodatne informacije: {4}

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than that supported by Microsoft Learning Components. Extra information: {2}
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost atributa koja započinje sa "{0}", {1}, je duža nego što je podržava Microsoft Learning Components. Dodatne informacije: {2}

Resources.Source: A <manifest> node in the correct namespace is required.
Resources.Translation: zahtjeva se <manifest> čvor u točnom prostoru imena.

Resources.Source: A manifest is required and is not present in the package.
Resources.Translation: Traži se manifest i nije zastupljen u pakiranju.

Resources.Source: The value of the PageID attribute, {0}, on a <Page> element is used more than once. PageID's must be unique for each <Page> element.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost atributa PageID, {0}, na <Page> elementu korištena je više puta. PageID mora biti jedinstven za svaki element<Page>.

Resources.Source: The <resource> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.21, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.1.
Resources.Translation: <resource> čvor mora imati identifikacijski atribut. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.21, ili SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.1.

Resources.Source: The node <{0}> has a value that is too long for the "{1}" attribute. It has been truncated to "{2}".
Resources.Translation: Čvor <{0}> ima vrijednost koja je preduga za "{1}" atribut. Ona je smanjena na "{2}".

Resources.Source: (empty string)
Resources.Translation: (prazan string)

Resources.Source: In multiple <mapInfo> nodes, true values are restricted. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.2.
Resources.Translation: U višestrukim <mapInfo> čvorovima, ispravne vrijednosti su ograničene. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.2.

Resources.Source: The referenced node can not be found.
Resources.Translation: Čvor na koji se upućuje nije pronađen.

Resources.Source: The value must be 0 or a positive integer.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost mora biti 0 ili pozitivni cijeli broj.

Resources.Source: A resource that belongs to an activity must have a type attribute set to "webcontent", an adlcp:scormType attribute set to "sco" or "asset", and a valid href attribute. {0}
Resources.Translation: Resurs koji pripada nekoj aktivnosti mora imati tip atributa postavljen na "webcontent", adlcp:scormType atribut stavljen na "sco" ili "asset", i vrijednost href atributa. {0}

Resources.Source: If an <item> element is a parent element, the <item> may not reference a <resource>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9. The full XML of the node is: {0}
Resources.Translation: Ako je <item> element roditeljski element,<item> možda ne upućuje na <resource>. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.9. The full XML of the node is: {0}

Resources.Source: The <rollupCondition> node must have a condition attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.2.
Resources.Translation: čvor<rollupCondition> mora imati atribut uvjetovanja. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.2.

Resources.Source: The <ruleConditions> node can only appear once in the <{0}> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.
Resources.Translation: čvor <ruleConditions> može se pojaviti samo jednom u <{0}> čvoru. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.3.1.1.

Resources.Source: In a list of <objectives>, there must be one and only one <primaryObjective> node.
Resources.Translation: U listi <objectives>, mora biti samo jedan <primaryObjective> čvor.

Resources.Source: There are multiple instances of element, <{0}>. All but the first are ignored. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Postoje višestruke instance elementa, <{0}>. Sve su zanemarene. Dodatne informacije:{1}

Resources.Source: The identifier is not a valid xs:ID.
Resources.Translation: Identifikatoru nije ispravan xs:ID.

Resources.Source: The <minNormalizedMeasure> node can only appear once in the <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Čvor <minNormalizedMeasure> može se pojaviti samo jednom u <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> čvoru. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.

Resources.Source: An Organization node is required for content used in Microsoft Learning Components.
Resources.Translation: Organizacijski čvor je potreban za sadržaj korišten u Microsoft Learning komponentama.

Resources.Source: The duplicate nodes share the same {0} value, "{1}". The values must be different.
Resources.Translation: Duplicirani čvorovi dijele istu vrijednost {0}, "{1}". Vrijednost mora biti različita.

Resources.Source: This package could not be opened. More information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Pakiranje se nije moglo otvoriti. Više informacija: {0}

Resources.Source: The package contains a manifest that contains badly formed XML.
Resources.Translation: Pakiranje sadrži manifest koji sadrži loše formirani XML.

Resources.Source: The objective must have an objectiveID attribute. Extra information: {0}
Resources.Translation: Objekt mora imati objectiveID atribut. Više informacija: {0}

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than that supported by for content used in Microsoft Learning Components. It has been truncated to {2} characters. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Atribut čija vrijednost započinje sa "{0}", {1}, je duži nego li je podržano za sadržaj u okvirima Microsoft Learning komponenti. On je smanjen za {2} znaka. Više informacija: {3}

Resources.Source: There are problems with the syntax of the prerequisite script, or a referenced identifier can not be found in the manifest.
Resources.Translation: Postoji problem sa sintaksom zatražene skripte, ili referencirani identifikator ne može biti pronađen u manifestu.

Resources.Source: The <organization> node must have an identifier attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.7, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.
Resources.Translation: čvor <organization> mora imati atribut identifikacije. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.7, ili SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.

Resources.Source: The file, {0}, referenced by the location element inside of metadata in the manifest contains invalid metadata.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka, {0}, navedena lokacijom elementa unutar meta podataka u manifestu sadrži pogrešne meta podatke.

Resources.Source: The value is out of range [-1 to 1] on the <minNormalizedMeasure> node in the <{0} objectiveID="{1}"> node. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost je van opsega [-1 to 1] na čvoru <minNormalizedMeasure> u čvoru <{0} objectiveID="{1}">. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.7.1.1.

Resources.Source: The <rollupAction> node is missing on an <rollupRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.
Resources.Translation: čvor <rollupAction> nedostaje na <rollupRule>. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.3.

Resources.Source: The <sequencing> node in a <sequencingCollection> must have an ID attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.1.
Resources.Translation: Čvor <sequencing> u <sequencingCollection> mora imati ID atribut. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.1.

Resources.Source: Unable to substitute a default value for the missing value of node <{0}> because the conversion process is not allowed to substitute default values for missing or erroneous values in the index.xml.
Resources.Translation: Ne može se zamijeniti osnovna vrijednost čvora <{0}> sa vrijednošću koja nedostaje jer konverzacijski proces ne dozvoljava zamjenu osnovne vrijednosti sa vrijednošću koja nedostaje ili je pogrešna u index.xml.

Resources.Source: The value that begins with "{0}" of the attribute, {1}, is longer than the smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}. Extra information: {3}
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost atributa koja započinje sa "{0}", {1}, je duža nego smallest permitted maximum (SPM), {2}. Više informacija: {3}

Resources.Source: The required element, <{0}>, is missing. Default values will be used. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Traženi element, <{0}>, nedostaje. Koristit će se osnovna vrijednost. Više informacija:{1}

Resources.Source: The file {0} does not exist.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka {0} više ne postoji.

Resources.Source: The attribute, {1}, containing the value "{0}" on node <{2}> is illegal in Resource packages.
Resources.Translation: Atribut, {1}, koji sadrži vrijednost "{0}" na čvoru <{2}> je ilegalan u resursnom pakiranju.

Resources.Source: The value must be a decimal value from 0 to 1, inclusive.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost mora biti decimalna vrijednost od 0 do 1.

Resources.Source: The <rollupConditions> node is missing on an <rollupRule>. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.
Resources.Translation: čvor <rollupConditions> nedostaje na <rollupRule>. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 5.1.6.1.1.

Resources.Source: <sequencingCollection> nodes are not permitted in resource packages. This manifest is considered a resource package because it has no <organization> nodes. See SCORM CAM 3.5.3.
Resources.Translation: čvor <sequencingCollection> nije dozvoljen u resursnom pakiranju. Manifest sadrži resursno pakiranje jer on nema čvor <organization>. Pogledaj SCORM CAM 3.5.3.

Resources.Source: The <file> node must have an href attribute. See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.23, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.3.
Resources.Translation: čvor <file> mora imati atribut href. Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.23, ili SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.4.3.

Resources.Source: The <title> node is missing on the <organization> node with identifier="{0}". See SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.8, or SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.1.
Resources.Translation: čvor <title> nedostaje na čvoru <organization> sa identifikatorom ="{0}". Pogledaj SCORM 1.3 CAM 3.4.1.8, ili SCORM 1.2 CAM 2.3.5.3.1.1.

Resources.Source: UA !There are multiple instances of element, <{0}>. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: UA !Postoje višestruke instance elementa, <{0}>. Više informacija:{1}

Resources.Source: The "{0}" value of attribute, {1}, on element <{2}> contains spaces, which are invalid URI characters. This URI is still being allowed, but the package may not work as expected.
Resources.Translation: Vrijednost "{0}" atributa, {1}, na elementu <{2}> sadrži praznine, koje su pogrešni URI znakovi. Ovaj URI je dozvoljen, ali pakiranje možda ne će radi prema očekivanju.

Resources.Source: The file {0} is not referenced in the manifest.
Resources.Translation: Datoteka {0} nije navedena u manifestu.

Resources.Source: The required element, <{0}>, is missing. Extra information:{1}
Resources.Translation: Traženi element, <{0}>, nedostaje. Više informacija:{1}
